Description:
This is The One
Immaculately presented with high quality finishes that are second to none, is this 30 plus squares Henley built home offering a functional free-flowing floor plan and modern aspects throughout. From the moment you enter this stunning home you will be thoroughly impressed with complete separate grand master bedroom inclusive of a large walk in robe and ensuite complete with double basins. Other three large bedrooms offer double built in robes and are in close proximity to the family bathroom.
The spectacular kitchen of the home is no less impressive with stone benchtops, European style stainless steel appliances, dishwasher and an oversized pantry. All this and a whole lot more overlooking a huge open plan family/meals area with lots of natural light flowing into the house. In addition to living and dining this
beautiful large home offers formal lounge, rear rumpus and kids retreat area. Extras include; ducted heating, internal access from double garage, quality fittings, high output led downlights...and the list goes on
Located in the very desirable young patch of Cranbourne, surrounded with quiet neighbourhood and great schools such as Cranbourne Carlisle primary school, moreover a short walk to Springhill shopping centre and easy access to Monash freeway entrance
Call Harry Brar today! This property will not last long!
Insights: 11 Flametree Circuit, Cranbourne VIC 3977 was last sold in 2017 and 83 other 4 bedroom house in Cranbourne have recently been sold.

Description:
A Hop and a Skip to the Train Station
Whether you are looking at getting your foot on the property market, downsizing or want to start your investment portfolio, this is The One for you. Conveniently located just a few minutes walk to the train station and a short drive to the main shopping centre, you will love this unit. The last one on a block of only 3 units, offering extra privacy, it features 3 bedrooms with built in robes, 1 bath, single lockup garage, spacious living area , kitchen and meals and a generous size backyard. Extras include ducted heating, ceiling fans in living room and kitchen .Be quick, it won't last long.

Description:
QUALITY HOME NEAR THE STATION!
Set on 641sqm in the heart of Cranbourne close to the train station, this great opportunity awaits. Featuring solid brick construction, 3 robed bedrooms all of a good size, renovated kitchen with stainless appliances including gas cooking, spacious living zone, dining area, evaporative cooling throughout, gas heating, updated family bathroom, NBN, rear access to double garage & low maintenance gardens. This solid home will suit investors and home buyers due to its excellent location, taking full advantage of central Cranbournes amenities such as schools, shops, childcare, public transport, parks and more. Whether starting out or adding to your portfolio, this is a smart investment with huge potential. Contact Daniel today!

Description:
4 bedroom Family Home Opposite the Park in a Convenient Location!
This beautiful brick family home situated in the ever so popular Brookland Greens Estate, oozing comfort and convenience is now up for the taking.
Set on a generous 613m2 Block, this property offers 4 generous sized carpeted bedrooms, master with full en-suite including spa bath and walk in robe, the remaining 2nd,3rd & 4th bedrooms all with built in robes which are serviced by the well-appointed main bathroom with separate toilet. You will be spoilt for choice with 3 separate living zones plus study, including the front living area, spacious open plan family area for entertaining friends & family, plus the light-filled theatre/rumpus room.
In addition, you will find a fully equipped kitchen with quality appliances, big pantry and ample cupboard/ bench space which adjoins the cosy meal area. Finally, you will adore the decked alfresco area with a view to neatly professionally landscaped gardens.
This gorgeous family home is further enhanced by split system cooling, ceiling fans, down lights through, tiled flooring and double car garage which offers rear yard and internal access and solar panels.
With views over the adjacent reserve and proximity to all amenities that Cranbourne has to offer: Cranbourne Shopping Centre, local schools, parks including the beautiful Royal Botanic Cranbourne Gardens, golf courses and public transport, you don't want to miss out on this one.

Description:
Fresh, Inviting and Immaculately Presented!
Located only moments from Cranbourne Train station, Shopping schools and park reserves, this fastidiously presented property will appeal to a multitude of buyers as the perfect first home an investment opportunity or the down sizer seeking a well serviced location. Elegantly renovated, this 3 bedroom property offers a spacious floor plan of 2 living areas, updated kitchen with lots of cupboard space and modern cooking facilities, 2 way bathroom adjoining the main bedroom and a large private pergola area for year round entertaining. The home includes Conara heater, split system reverse cycle air conditioner, newly laid carpets and attractive low maintenance gardens surround. Simply move in and enjoy this beautifully presented well located property, approx 293m2 block. Call Jess today for further details.
Achievable rent $350 pw (Approx)

Description:
Family home on a huge block (approx. 776m2)
Introducing a 3 bedroom family home in quiet court location on a big block with even its own greenhouse. Yes, the possibilities are endless, from a huge vegetable garden to games of cricket. This property will no doubt suit investors or first home buyers.
Inside, you will be impressed by the quality floating floors throughout, which will illuminate carpet allergies.
The lucky buyer will also welcome the following additional features:
- Well-appointed kitchen, boasting stainless steel oven/cooktop & dishwasher
- Ducted Heating, Coonara Open Fire place, split system and ceiling fan
- All 3 bedrooms are fitted with built in robes
- Large undercover pergola with concrete flooring
- Long driveway, offering more off street parking
- Massive 6000lt water tank positioned nicely next to greenhouse
- Storage/garden shed alongside established fruit trees
Easy access to South Gippsland Highway & freeways. Close to highly sought after schools Lyndhurst Secondary College& literally walking distance to Rangebank Primary School. Also minutes away from Merinda Park Train Station, Cranbourne Home Centre & Thompson Park Shopping Centre.
Photo ID required for all inspections

4 Bedroom home great central location, fantastic kitchen with stainless steel under bench oven, gas cooktop and dishwasher, updated bathroom with 6 jet corner spa.
Spacious lounge/ family room with coonara heater and split system heating and cooling, exposed beams, and vaulted ceilings and brick feature wall ad character plus another utility room (suit teenagers) behind the two car tandem garage.
Outdoors we have a huge pergola patio area and garden shed on a very generous 653M2 block, inspections are by appointment only call Frank Barrett to arrange yours.

Description:
HARD TO FIND APPROX. 710m2 BLOCK
(217370) The home needs a little TLC but look at the land size 710m2 approx. block in a court location.
3 Bedrooms all with built in robes and the master bedroom having two way access to the bathroom. The kitchen has a stainless steel wall oven and gas cooktop plus dishwasher.
A little bit of finishing off and some tiling is needing done and a fresh coat of paint but nothing major, gas heating plus air conditioner ensures year round comfort.
Outdoors we have a large pergola patio area plus a double steel garage all on a huge 710m2 approx. block.
Call Frank Barrett for all enquiries inspections are by appointment only.
WE ARE OPEN SUNDAYS.

Description:
As beautiful as Cleopatra
If you are looking for a grand living, open space, big size rooms, great outdoor entertainment area, extra workshop in the garage and the list goes on then look no further, this house got it all. Conveniently located close to shopping centres, public transport, quality schools, parks and all other amenities is this beautiful home proudly boasting: -
4 bedrooms, master with full ensuite and WIR’s
Massive open plan kitchen with plenty of storage space
2 huge living areas including the formal lounge and family plus the separate dining area
Double lock up garage with internal, remote.
Extras include: - gas ducted heating, split system cooling, filtered main water supply and additional osmosis filter drinking water in the kitchen, back to base security alarm system, stone benchtop in the kitchen, dishwasher, downlights, timber deck at the front entrance and in the alfresco, rain water tank, featured walls, paved outdoor area, side gate, quality curtains, light fittings and many more
Call now to inspect

Description:
NEST OR INVEST
Rarely do we see such a modern, well maintained unit in such a central location come to the market, so you'd best be quick! Walking distance to shopping centre, transport, medical - everything you could need or want (yet whisper quiet), the light filled unit offers 2 BRs plus study/3rd BR, spacious modern kitchen complete with dishwasher, ample bench & cupboard space, large bathroom & sep toilet. The private & sheltered courtyard is low maintenance with no grass to maintain softened with a small garden bed. Add to this ducted heating, split system cooling, alarm & single remote garage with internal access, this one truly has got it all! The middle unit of only 3 on the block - this one must be inspected to be believed.
Property Snapshot:
2 bedrooms
Study/3rd bedroom
Dishwasher
Ducted heating
Split system cooling
Remote single garage
Internal access from garage
Alarm system
Loads of natural light
Private & sheltered courtyard

Description:
Blink and it will be gone!
Developers, First Home Buyers or Astute investors.....step right up to seize this excellent opportunity to own this impressive four bedroom home on approximately 665m2 of prime real estate! Some key features on offer include:
- Four Bedrooms
- Master bedroom with full ensuite
- Formal lounge
- Combined meals & family room
- Gas ducted heating & split system air conditioner
- Alarm system
- Attic ladder for roof storage
- Solar Panels
- Shed / work shop
- Court Location
- Short distance to Train Station
- Short distance to Schools & Shops
To be prepared contact us today for a copy of the section 32, contact your lender for your finance and be ready to purchase! With it's possible unit development possibilities - subject to the relevant council approvals this property has some outstanding attributes. It offers so many choices for one lucky buyer!
** Investors: Did you know Harcourts Narre Warren South are one of the largest rental management agencies in the South East? Our department head of rentals Melanie Keating has appraised this property at $360-$370p/w ($1,564-$1,608pcm) for more details about leasing contact Melanie on 03 9705 3000 today.

Description:
Massive Opportunity Smack Bang Central!
A Great home in a central location makes this property a very appealing proposition! Set on a large block of 620m2(approx) with an opportunity to build another dwelling at the back (STCA) nestled in a blue-chip location surrounded by all the town centre's local amenities. This home is sitting right in front of the childcare and Cranbourne Park Primary School with a short walk to Cranbourne Train Station and Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre.
The property consists of a separate lounge, 3 great size bedrooms with built in robes, all are in close proximity to the family bath room with separate bath and shower facilities. Separate kitchen with plenty of cupboard space with adjoining meals area overlooking the outdoor entertaining area.
This property will not last long! Please contact Vikram on 0430 392 918 direct to arrange an inspection.

Description:
Family Entertainer on 1277sqm block
This is your chance to purchase this stunning property in a quiet corner of Cranbourne. Set on a large block, in a fantastic location, close to all amenities with lots of upgrades. Features of this beautiful home include:
- Four spacious bedrooms with built in robes. The master has a window seat to enjoy, walk in robe and a built-in robe. A full ensuite with large oval bath, double vanity and large shower.
- The designer kitchen needs to be seen to be believed. Stone benches, loads of drawers & storage, 900mm steel oven, feature glass range hood, glass splash back and a built-in pantry. With two separate servery windows that open out to the entertaining area make this the perfect environment for anyone who loves to entertain family & friends.
- This home has an open plan design with a meals area overlooking the kitchen, a living area with a feature bulk head that overlooks the back yard and another, more quiet living space at the front of the home. Room to entertain as much as you like.
- Step outside to the covered alfresco and prepare to be wowed! This space is huge. Approximately 12 squares of outdoor entertaining space. The timber lined roof has downlights and ceiling fans, there's also built in seating by the low maintenance gardens to enjoy. You can cook till your heart is content with this outdoor kitchen set up. There are built in hot plates and two built in Ziegler & Brown barbeques.
- If you have things to store then look no further. This home has a double garage attached to the home with internal access. Double gates get you into the backyard where you have another garage. This one has two roller doors, concrete floor and three phase power.
The owner of this home has spared no expense when building the home. There are numerous upgrades, some of which include ducted commercial grade refrigerated heating and cooling, insulated internal wall throughout the entire home, downlights, three phase power, custom made blinds, high ceilings, roller shutters, custom made curtains and blinds. This home has everything you could want for your family. A fabulous home in great location. Do yourself a favour and make an appointment to inspect this property. You don't want to drive past it and wish it had been yours!
Insights: 14 Hilda Way, Cranbourne VIC 3977 was last sold in 2017 and 83 other 4 bedroom house in Cranbourne have recently been sold.

Description:
Its All About the LOCATION!
Nestled in a safe & quiet complex, this is the ideal property for first home buyers, people wishing to downsize to a carefree lifestyle or investors looking to take advantage of this quality opportunity.
This jammed packed unit boasts two generous sized robed bedrooms, a great sized living area upon entry, fully equipped kitchen with ample cupboard/bench space which overlooks the meals area, central bathroom fit with vanity, toilet and bath/shower facilities, separate laundry with convenient external access. Fully secured private courtyard with the added extra of a small garden shed. In addition, you will find a single carport.
Adding to the appeal this unit boasts air conditioning, gas ducting heating and floating floorboards.
Offering a prime location within walking distance to Cranbourne Train station and close proximity to everything else that Cranbourne has to offer: Shopping Centres, schools, restaurants and sporting/recreational facilities, this home ensures quality living meets convenience.

Description:
INVEST NEAR THE STATION ON 655SQM!
Your property search could be over with this great three bedroom home representing huge potential in a prime location. Within minutes to the train station, buses, two primary schools, childcare & shops, this home is a must see for investors. Featuring a large block of approx 655sqm with no easement, 3 generous bedrooms, central family bathroom, spacious kitchen, good sized lounge, lock up garage and plenty of room in the backyard, this home has space for everyone to enjoy. A great opportunity in the premium location of central Cranbourne. Currently leased to a long term tenant. Contact Daniel today.

Description:
Ideal development site 889sqm STCA
Situated on an enormous 889 square metre allotments is this great 5-bedroom 2-bathroom family home perfect for the now and ideal for your future plans STCA and all relevant authorities.
- Featuring 2 separate living areas. Delightful bay windows at the front & a wood heater in the lounge plus an attractive brick feature wall.
- With functional kitchen opening to a meals area on one side & a spacious family room on the other.
- Outside there is a huge pergola/entertainment area & drive through access to the garage/workshop & to top it off there is a swimming pool.
Located within close proximity of the Cranbourne Home Maker Centre which includes Bunnings & a short drive to your choice of Schools plus Monash Freeway is within close reach.
